answerText: White Noise[10] In Don DeLillo's White Noise, Jack is a professor in a field dedicated to this historical figure. The DeLillo novel Running Dog is about the search for a pornographic film reportedly created by this man.
heading: MUT |2012 | 3 | 15 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The protagonist of this novel is convinced that he will die soon after he is exposed to Nyodene D during an "Airborne Toxic Event," while his wife becomes addicted to the drug Dylar. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel, in which professor Jack Gladney eventually loses his fear of dying after watching his son Wilder successfully ride his bike across a highway.
